commit message:
Workaround: some Implementations of blocking BluetoothStream.read() cause IoException if called too fast
-> check availability of RX data before calling read()
-> if no data available wait 500 ns

Workaround: some Implementations of blocking BluetoothStream.read() cause IoException if called too fast
